short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prospecting Scorecard extension by Siege Media. Evaluate your outreach prospect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluate your outreach prospect by looking at different aspects of the website: does it have an updated date? does it include links to .org & .edu? nofollow links? This extension provides a scorecard for each website.
